00072 //
00073 // arma_sigprint
00074 
00075 //! print a message on cout, with a preceding @ character.
00076 //! used for printing the signature of a function
00077 //! (see the arma_extra_debug_sigprint macro) 
00078 inline
00079 void
00080 arma_sigprint(const char* x)
00081   {
00082   std::cout << "@ " << x;
00083   }

00152 //
00153 // arma_warn
00154 
00155 //! if state is true, print a message on cout
00156 template<typename T1>
00157 inline
00158 void
00159 arma_warn(const bool state, const T1& x)
00160   {
00161   if(state==true)
00162     {
00163     arma_print(x);
00164     }
00165   }
00166 
00167 
00168 template<typename T1, typename T2>
00169 inline
00170 void
00171 arma_warn(const bool state, const T1& x, const T2& y)
00172   {
00173   if(state==true)
00174     {
00175     arma_print(x,y);
00176     }
00177   }
00178

00201 
00202 //
00203 // arma_check
00204 
00205 //! if state is true, throw a run-time error exception
00206 template<typename T1>
00207 inline
00208 void
00209 arma_check(const bool state, const T1& x)
00210   {
00211   if(state==true)
00212     {
00213     throw std::runtime_error(x);
00214     }
00215   }
00216 
00217 
00218 template<typename T1, typename T2>
00219 inline
00220 void
00221 arma_check(const bool state, const T1& x, const T2& y)
00222   {
00223   if(state==true)
00224     {
00225     throw std::runtime_error( std::string(x) + std::string(y) );
00226     }
00227   }
00228 
00229 
00230 #ifdef ARMA_USE_BOOST
00231   template<typename T1>
00232   inline
00233   void
00234   arma_check(const bool state, const arma_boost::basic_format<T1>& x)
00235     {
00236     if(state==true)
00237       {
00238       throw std::runtime_error(str(x));
00239       }
00240     }
00241 #else
00242   template<typename T1, typename T2>
00243   inline
00244   void
00245   arma_check(const bool state, const arma_boost::basic_format<T1,T2>& x)
00246     {
00247     if(state==true)
00248       {
00249       throw std::runtime_error(str(x));
00250       }
00251     }
00252 #endif

00255 
00256 inline
00257 std::string
00258 arma_incompat_size_string(const u32 A_n_rows, const u32 A_n_cols, const u32 B_n_rows, const u32 B_n_cols, const char* x)
00259   {
00260   std::stringstream tmp;
00261   
00262   tmp << x << ": incompatible matrix dimensions: (" << A_n_rows << "," << A_n_cols << ") and (" << B_n_rows << "," << B_n_cols << ")";
00263   
00264   return tmp.str();
00265   }

00268 
00269 inline
00270 void
00271 arma_assert_same_size(const u32 A_n_rows, const u32 A_n_cols, const u32 B_n_rows, const u32 B_n_cols, const char* x)
00272   {
00273   if( (A_n_rows != B_n_rows) || (A_n_cols != B_n_cols) )
00274     {
00275     throw std::runtime_error
00276       (
00277       arma_incompat_size_string(A_n_rows, A_n_cols, B_n_rows, B_n_cols, x)
00278       );
00279     }
00280   }
00281 
00282 
00283 
00284 //! if given matrices have different sizes, throw a run-time error exception
00285 template<typename eT1, typename eT2>
00286 inline
00287 void
00288 arma_assert_same_size(const basic_mat<eT1>& A, const basic_mat<eT2>& B, const char* x)
00289   {
00290   if( (A.n_rows != B.n_rows) || (A.n_cols != B.n_cols) )
00291     {
00292     throw std::runtime_error
00293       (
00294       arma_incompat_size_string(A.n_rows, A.n_cols, B.n_rows, B.n_cols, x)
00295       );
00296     }
00297   }

00429 //
00430 // arma_stop
00431 
00432 //! throw a run-time error exception
00433 template<typename T1>
00434 inline
00435 void
00436 arma_stop(const T1& x)
00437   {
00438   arma_check(true, x);
00439   }

00444 // macros
00445 
00446 
00447 #define ARMA_STRING1(x) #x
00448 #define ARMA_STRING2(x) ARMA_STRING1(x)
00449 #define ARMA_FILELINE  __FILE__ ": " ARMA_STRING2(__LINE__)

00451 
00452 #if defined (__GNUG__)
00453   #define ARMA_FNSIG  __PRETTY_FUNCTION__
00454 #elif defined (_MSC_VER)
00455   #define ARMA_FNSIG  __FUNCSIG__ 
00456 #elif defined (ARMA_USE_BOOST)
00457   #define ARMA_FNSIG  BOOST_CURRENT_FUNCTION  
00458 #else 
00459   #define ARMA_FNSIG  "(unknown)"
00460 #endif

00464 #if !defined(ARMA_NO_DEBUG) && !defined(NDEBUG)
00465   
00466   #define arma_debug_print            arma_print
00467   #define arma_debug_warn             arma_warn
00468   #define arma_debug_check            arma_check
00469   #define arma_debug_assert_same_size arma_assert_same_size
00470   #define arma_debug_assert_mul_size  arma_assert_mul_size
00471   
00472 #else
00473   
00474   #undef ARMA_EXTRA_DEBUG
00475   
00476   #define arma_debug_print            true ? (void)0 : arma_print
00477   #define arma_debug_warn             true ? (void)0 : arma_warn
00478   #define arma_debug_check            true ? (void)0 : arma_check
00479   #define arma_debug_assert_same_size true ? (void)0 : arma_assert_same_size
00480   #define arma_debug_assert_mul_size  true ? (void)0 : arma_assert_mul_size
00481 
00482 #endif
00483 
00484 
00485 #if defined(ARMA_EXTRA_DEBUG)
00486   
00487   #define arma_extra_debug_sigprint       arma_sigprint(ARMA_FNSIG); arma_bktprint
00488   #define arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this  arma_sigprint(ARMA_FNSIG); arma_thisprint
00489   #define arma_extra_debug_print          arma_print
00490   #define arma_extra_debug_warn           arma_warn
00491   #define arma_extra_debug_check          arma_check
00492 
00493 #else
00494   
00495   #define arma_extra_debug_sigprint        true ? (void)0 : arma_bktprint
00496   #define arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this   true ? (void)0 : arma_thisprint
00497   #define arma_extra_debug_print           true ? (void)0 : arma_print
00498   #define arma_extra_debug_warn            true ? (void)0 : arma_warn
00499   #define arma_extra_debug_check           true ? (void)0 : arma_check
00500  
00501 #endif

00506 #if defined(ARMA_EXTRA_DEBUG)
00507 
00508   namespace junk
00509     {
00510     class arma_first_extra_debug_message
00511       {
00512       public:
00513       
00514       inline
00515       arma_first_extra_debug_message()
00516         {
00517         std::cout << "@ ---" << std::endl;
00518         std::cout << "@ Armadillo " << arma_version::major << '.' << arma_version::minor << '.' << arma_version::patch << std::endl;
00519         std::cout << "@ arma_config::atlas  = " << arma_config::atlas << std::endl;
00520         std::cout << "@ arma_config::lapack = " << arma_config::lapack << std::endl;
00521         std::cout << "@ arma_config::blas   = " << arma_config::blas << std::endl;
00522         std::cout << "@ arma_config::boost  = " << arma_config::boost << std::endl;
00523         std::cout << "@ sizeof(int)  = " << sizeof(int)  << std::endl;
00524         std::cout << "@ sizeof(int*) = " << sizeof(int*) << std::endl;
00525         std::cout << "@ sizeof(long) = " << sizeof(long) << std::endl;
00526         std::cout << "@ ---" << std::endl;
00527         }
00528       
00529       };
00530     
00531     static arma_first_extra_debug_message arma_first_extra_debug_message_run;
00532     }
00533 
00534 #endif
